arts.ttl: Sheffield United boss sends simple but encouraging message to Portsmouth after Fratton Park stalemate
arts.sum: Pompey picked up another impressive point against the Championship promotion contenders.

arts.ttl: ‘I loved it’: Portsmouth boss’ salute to faithful after Sheffield United feel bearpit Fratton heat
arts.sum: John Mousinho paid tribute to Pompey fans as Sheffield United felt the Fratton intensity.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss remains in dark over centre-back's injury in Sheffield United warm-up as left-back's absence is explained
arts.sum: John Mousinho is waiting to hear the full extent of the injury that forced Conor Shaughnessy to delay his Pompey comeback.

arts.ttl: Jacob Farrell's Portsmouth regret after agonisingly close to perfect debut in Sheffield United stalemate
arts.sum: Jacob Farrell rued failing to register the perfect debut after spurning a golden late chance to become a matchwinner.

arts.ttl: 'Decent point. Need to start scoring goals' - the Portsmouth verdict following goalless draw with Sheffield United
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to the Blues’ goalless draw against Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth wait for Championship win goes on in frantic Sheffield United draw
arts.sum: Pompey’s wait for a Championship win continued as they grafted their way out to another hard-earned point against Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: 'Don't write him off, Very encouraging, Baptism of fire': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings for Sheffield United draw
arts.sum: Pompey continue to search for a first win of the season, but can be heartened by a robust display against Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United stay unbeaten after stalemate at Portsmouth
arts.sum: Pompey goalkeeper Will Norris was forced into four saves – including a stunning stop to deny Gustavo Hamer.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth dealt yet another injury blow ahead of Sheffield United game in latest twist to Championship campaign
arts.sum: Pompey have been dealt another new injury blow.

arts.ttl: 'Best line-up we can play. We're winning this. Very, very pleased' - The Portsmouth reaction to starting XI v Sheffield United
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to John Mousinho’s starting XI for today’s Championship game against Sheffield United.
